```{r}
# Load necessary libraries.

library(devtools)
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)
library(stargazer)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)

# Load data. rename dataframes for ease of mind.

data_case <- read_csv("glynn_sen_daughters_by_case_1.csv")
data_judge <- read_csv("glynn_sen_daughters_by_judge.csv")

read_csv("glynn_sen_daughters_replication_code.R")

```

```{r Table 1}

table_1 <- data_judge %>% 
  select(child,
         girls,
         republican) %>%
  group_by(republican) %>% 
  summarize(total = n()) %>% 
  count(republican)

table_1 %>% 
  kable(caption = "Number of Children and Girls for U.S. Courts of Appeals Judges Participating in Gender-Related Cases, 1996-2002",
      digits = 1) %>% 
  group_rows("Number of Children", 1, 2) %>%
  group_rows("Number of Girls", 3, 4)

```
